isis.stitle: 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES FS-5106 AND FS-6206 - LUBRICATION - PROPER OIL LEVEL

svcproc.title: PROPER OIL LEVEL
svcproc.para: Make sure oil is level with filler opening. Because you can reach oil with your finger does not mean oil is at proper level. One inch of oil level is about one gallon of oil.

para.emph: Proper Lubrication Levels as Related to Transmission Installation Angles

svcproc.para: If the transmission operating angle is more than 12 degrees, improper lubrication can occur. The operating angle is the transmission mounting angle in the chassis plus percent of upgrade (expressed in degrees).
Anytime the transmission operating angle of 12 degrees is exceeded for an extended period of time, the transmission should be equipped with an oil pump or cooler kit to insure proper lubrication.
